ItemDescription.Description: Your abilities deal bonus damage based on targets health.
ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal an additional 3% of the targets maximum Health as Physical Damage. If you have over 200 Physical Power, your ability bonus damage scales up. This effect reaches a maximum of 6% Maximum Health damage at 400 Physical Power. Subsequent hits on the same target do 75% bonus damage for the next 3s.
